title: No I don't want to turn on Windows Backup with One Drive
author: firefoxd
aiHeadline: Microsoft's latest attempt to force you into the cloud is so annoying, you'll want to throw your laptop out the window.

title: Macro Splats 2025

aiHeadline: Because the world didn't have enough chaos, here's a new way to make your macros explode in 2025.

title: Wireguard FPGA
author: hasheddan
aiHeadline: Geeks everywhere are drooling over this FPGA-powered WireGuard solution, because who doesn't love a good hardware upgrade?

title: Schleswig-Holstein completes migration to open source email
author: sebastian_z
aiHeadline: Finally, some government actually did something right by ditching expensive email systems for open-source solutions that actually work.

title: Jeep pushed software update that bricked all 2024 Wrangler 4xe models
author: PKop
aiHeadline: Jeep proves once again that they're the kings of the automotive world by successfully bricking every single 2024 Wrangler 4xe with a software update.
